pages.text: Build the multi-block structure above to summon the Eyeball Monster. Obsidian, obsidian, dragon eggs and candles that need to cry. Valid only in the End.
After defeating the Eye, a portal will spawn that will be right-clicked to enter.
After entering the portal, you can see Void Shadow, the amount of health is extremely high, please be careful.
The Shadow Chest generated after defeating Void Shadow will contain source stones. And you'll get the "fame" buff, with which you can start hatching dragon eggs.
